From: Venkat Gayam, iTech US Inc

We have an urgent requirement for you and the details are as follows…

Job Title: Python Developer
Location: Detroit MI /Dearborn MI (Day1 onsite)
Duration: 6+ Months (Implementation/Prime Vendor Partner: TCS)

Job Details:
Need Strong profile on Python Developer with 8+yrs IT exp.

3. Should have at least 1+ years of working experience on Rest API
4. Should have at least 2+ years of Application Development Experience
5. Should have experience on Pytest and Jenkins
6. Working experience on GCP will add an advantage.
